name: Basketball Throw Master
description:
Basketball Throw Master is an simple but very addictive game which is based on realistic physics.

In this game you have to achieve your target in limited period of time to complete level & beat the highest score.

Features
-Easy to control, fun for every age players.
-Great throwing experience.
-Simple but special picture style.
- Great game sound effects & music
-Many type of balls & grounds
